resources.string: Get started with %1$s; in just a few steps
Press the power button on the top of the fuselage, after 2 seconds, click the screen to shut down to shut down the device
Find the "notch" position, buckle up, and open the back cover
Select the correct SIM card of the device or tailor the SIM card to the corresponding specification
Load SIM card into card slot
According to the schematic position of SIM card in the back cover, push SIM card into the slot to complete the installation
Insert the PASM card into the card slot

According to the indicated position of the card in the back cover, push the PSAM card into the slot with the wide end facing Li and the metal surface down to complete the installation of the PSAM card
As shown in figure, open the cover of the paper bin, put in the printing paper and pull out part of the paper to the outside of the incision, close the cover to complete the installation
Press the Power Key for 11 seconds to power off,and boot again.
When the device is not in use for a long time, please fill it with electricity to avoid battery damage. And keep the screen clean

1,If the printing appears fuzzy,you can use the cotton swab stick to remove the dirt from the ceramic piece.\n2,Regulary use a soft brush to clean paper bin,especially dust roller,paper cutter,sensor.
Touch the screen to pull down the status bar, then click the screen shot button in the shortcut menu.
Simultaneously press the power button and volume down button.\n(If it is still not available, check to see if the \'sets-custom volume\' button is turned off.)
Find Settings on the home screen and click
Find "Connected devices" in the settings list, click to enter the connected devices page
Find "Connection Preferences" in the list of connected devices, click to enter the Connection Preferences page
Find \"bluetooth\" in the Settings list and click to enter the bluetooth page
Click the switch to open the bluetooth,and confirm that the bluetooth is in a connectable state
Back to desktop and open your APP
Find Print Setting,connect or add printer
